name: Cakap

features: Provide learning for kids to comapnies
All in one platform with multiple device support
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Elevate people’s lives through high-quality education
ShortDescription: Cakap is an upskilling platform in Indonesia with more than 4 million users spread throughout the country.
enhanced_description: Cakap is a prominent upskilling platform based in Indonesia, serving over 4 million users across the country. It is dedicated to providing high-quality educational skill enhancement opportunities, aiming to improve and elevate the lives of Indonesians. The platform offers comprehensive learning solutions, including foreign language improvement courses and vocational training. Cakap caters to a diverse audience, from individuals (kids and adults) to companies, offering an all-in-one platform with multi-device support for efficient employee training in various fields.
competitive_advantages: Extensive user base in Indonesia (4M+ users)
